mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.sys_org_id AS "sysOrgId", a.name AS "name", a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids AS "parentIds", a.tree_level AS "treeLevel", a.sort AS "sort", a.version AS "version", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pro_class( id, sys_org_id, name, parent_id, parent_ids, tree_level, sort, version, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{sysOrgId}, #{name}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{treeLevel}, #{sort}, #{version}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE pro_class SET sys_org_id = #{sysOrgId}, name = #{name}, parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, tree_level = #{treeLevel}, sort = #{sort}, version = #{version}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
